tiles.title: Success and Failure over last 30 days
Web API performance over last 3 weeks

queries.text:
requests
| where timestamp >= ago(30d)
| summarize SuccessCount = countif(success == true), TotalCount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| extend SuccessRate = todouble(SuccessCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100
| render timechart

requests
| where timestamp >= ago(30d)
| summarize SuccessCount = countif(success != true), TotalCount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| extend SuccessRate = todouble(SuccessCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100
| render timechart

let W0 = requests
| where timestamp >= startofweek(ago(7d)) and timestamp < startofweek(now())
| where isnotempty(operation_Name) and trim(" ", operation_Name) != "" 
       and not(operation_Name matches regex "^[0-9a-fA-F-]{36}$")
| summarize 
    P99_W0 = percentile(duration, 99),
    P95_W0 = percentile(duration, 95),
    P75_W0 = percentile(duration, 75),
    P50_W0 = percentile(duration, 50) 
    by operation_Name;
let W1 = requests
| where timestamp >= startofweek(ago(14d)) and timestamp < startofweek(ago(7d))
| where isnotempty(operation_Name) and trim(" ", operation_Name) != "" 
       and not(operation_Name matches regex "^[0-9a-fA-F-]{36}$")
| summarize 
    P99_W1 = percentile(duration, 99),
    P95_W1 = percentile(duration, 95),
    P75_W1 = percentile(duration, 75),
    P50_W1 = percentile(duration, 50) 
    by operation_Name;
let W2 = requests
| where timestamp >= startofweek(ago(21d)) and timestamp < startofweek(ago(14d))
| where isnotempty(operation_Name) and trim(" ", operation_Name) != "" 
       and not(operation_Name matches regex "^[0-9a-fA-F-]{36}$")
| summarize 
    P99_W2 = percentile(duration, 99),
    P95_W2 = percentile(duration, 95),
    P75_W2 = percentile(duration, 75),
    P50_W2 = percentile(duration, 50) 
    by operation_Name;
W0
| join kind=fullouter (W1) on operation_Name
| join kind=fullouter (W2) on operation_Name
| where isnotempty(operation_Name) and trim(" ", operation_Name) != ""  
| project operation_Name, 
    P99_W0, P99_W1, P99_W2,
    P95_W0, P95_W1, P95_W2,
    P75_W0, P75_W1, P75_W2,
    P50_W0, P50_W1, P50_W2
| order by operation_Name asc

// Stacked column chart for performance buckets
requests
| where timestamp >= ago(30d)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), performanceBucket
| render columnchart

requests
| where timestamp >= ago(30d)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), resultCode
| order by timestamp asc

requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| summarize SuccessCount = countif(success == true), TotalCount = count()
| extend SuccessRate = todouble(SuccessCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100
| project SuccessRate

requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| extend cd = parse_json(customDimensions)
| where cd.resourceProvider has "Cloud Flow"
| summarize SuccessCount = countif(success == true), TotalCount = count()
| extend SuccessRate = todouble(SuccessCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100
| project SuccessRate

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "Plugin"
| extend cd = parse_json(customDimensions)
| project timestamp, success, correlationId = cd.correlationId, typeName = cd.pluginType
| summarize NumberofRequest = count(), Passed = dcountif(timestamp, success == "True"), Failed = dcountif(timestamp, success == "False") by tostring(typeName)
| extend SuccessRate = todouble(Passed) / todouble(NumberofRequest) * 100
| project SuccessRate

requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| order by timestamp asc
| render timechart

let perOperation = 
requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| summarize 
    FailedCount = countif(success == false),
    ImpactedUsers = dcountif(user_Id, success == false),
    TotalCount = count()
    by operation_Name;
let overallTotal =
requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| summarize 
        FailedCount = countif(success == false),
        ImpactedUsers = dcountif(user_Id, success == false),
        TotalCount = count()
| extend operation_Name = "Total";
union perOperation, overallTotal
| where FailedCount > 0
| order by FailedCount desc nulls last

requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where success == false
| summarize Count = count() by resultCode
| order by Count desc
| render barchart

requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where success == false
| project requestTimestamp = timestamp, operation_Id, resultCode, url
| join kind=inner (
    exceptions
    | where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
    | where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
    | where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
    | where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
    | project exceptionTimestamp = timestamp, operation_Id, exceptionType = type
) on operation_Id
| summarize Count = count() by exceptionType
| order by Count desc
| render barchart

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type in~ ("SDKCreate", "SDKUpdate", "SDKDelete", "SDKUpsert", "SDKUpsertMultiple")
| summarize Count = count() by name
| order by Count desc
| render piechart

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "SDKCreate"
| summarize Count = count() by name
| order by Count desc

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type in~ ("SDKUpdate", "SDKUpsert", "SDKUpsertMultiple")
| summarize Count = count() by name
| order by Count desc

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "SDKDelete"
| summarize Count = count() by name
| order by Count desc

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type in~ ("SDKRetrieve", "SDKRetrieveMultiple")
| summarize Count = count() by name
| order by Count desc
| render piechart

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "Plugin"
| extend cd = parse_json(customDimensions)
| project timestamp, success, correlationId = cd.correlationId, typeName = cd.pluginType
| summarize NumberofRequest = count(), Passed = dcountif(timestamp, success == "True"), Failed = dcountif(timestamp, success == "False") by tostring(typeName)
| order by Failed desc

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "Plugin"
| summarize TotalPlugins = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| order by timestamp asc
| render timechart

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| where type == "Plugin"
| extend cd = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend typeName = tostring(cd.pluginType)
| summarize InvocationCount = count() by typeName
| order by InvocationCount desc
| take 20

let requestUsers = 
requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
let dependencyUsers = 
dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
let traceUsers = 
traces
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
union requestUsers, dependencyUsers, traceUsers
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| order by timestamp asc;
let pageViewUsers =
pageViews
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince in (state)
| where isempty(city) or client_City in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
union requestUsers, dependencyUsers, traceUsers, pageViewUsers
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| order by timestamp asc

let requestUsers = 
requests
| where timestamp > ago(5m)
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project user_Id;
let dependencyUsers = 
dependencies
| where timestamp > ago(5m)
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project user_Id;
let traceUsers = 
traces
| where timestamp > ago(5m)
| where isempty( region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty( state) or client_CountryOrRegion in (state)
| where isempty( city) or client_CountryOrRegion in (city)
| project user_Id;
union requestUsers, dependencyUsers, traceUsers
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize CurrentlyActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id)

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where client_Type == "Browser" or client_Type == "Server"
| where isnotempty(user_Id) and isnotempty(client_CountryOrRegion)
| summarize 
    ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id), 
    TotalInstances = count()
    by client_CountryOrRegion
| order by ActiveUsers desc

dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where client_Type == "Mobile"
| where isnotempty(user_Id) and isnotempty(client_CountryOrRegion)
| summarize 
    ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id), 
    TotalInstances = count()
    by client_CountryOrRegion
| order by ActiveUsers desc

let requestUsers = 
requests
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince in (state)
| where isempty(city) or client_City in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
let dependencyUsers = 
dependencies
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince in (state)
| where isempty(city) or client_City in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
let traceUsers = 
traces
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince in (state)
| where isempty(city) or client_City in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
let pageViewUsers =
pageViews
| where timestamp > _startTime and timestamp < _endTime
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince in (state)
| where isempty(city) or client_City in (city)
| project timestamp, user_Id;
union requestUsers, dependencyUsers, traceUsers, pageViewUsers
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize EventCount = count(), FirstSeen = min(timestamp), LastSeen = max(timestamp) by user_Id
| order by EventCount desc

requests
| where timestamp > ago( 30d)
| distinct client_CountryOrRegion

requests
| where timestamp > ago( 30d)
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| distinct client_StateOrProvince

requests
| where timestamp > ago( 30d)
| where isempty(region) or client_CountryOrRegion in (region)
| where isempty(state) or client_StateOrProvince  in (state)
| distinct client_City
